description: Tallest, fastest, longest roller coaster in Poland. Features a 269 ft (82m) nearly vertical 85° drop, underground tunnel, airtime hills, high G pull-outs.

description: First RMC I-Box tracked roller coaster built from the ground up. Features a stall, zero-g rolls, airtime.

location: Adinkerke-De Panne, West Flanders, Flemish Region
description: Europe's first Mack Rides Xtreme Spinning Coaster, themed to Tomorrowland festival. Holds record for most inversions on a spinning coaster. Features heartline roll, LSM launch, banana roll, vertical loop, zero-g roll, double inverting dive loop.

description: First RMC hybrid coaster in Europe. Replaced Robin Hood. Holds record for most inversions on a hybrid coaster. Features 14 airtime moments, 270 degrees Double Inverting Corner Stall.
element_tags: 14 airtime moments, 270 degrees Double Inverting Corner Stall, Zero G-roll.

description: Longest rollercoaster with inversions and longest launch coaster in Europe. Features 7 inversions, 4 launches, 2.2 seconds of weightlessness, world's steepest launch at 105 degrees. Themed around Nikola Tesla.

description: Tallest and fastest coaster in Europe when opened. Features large drops and floater airtime. Themed to an expedition into the Himalayas.

description: Multi LSM Launch Coaster with 3 launches, 12 airtime moments, 4 inversions, and a swing brake. Themed to Batman.

description: Tallest/fastest coaster in Benelux on opening. Features an 80-degree twisted drop, 38m tall hill, RMC-esque outerbank, non-inverting cobra roll, low-to-the-ground wave turn, twisted double down, bunny hills.
element_tags: 80-degree twisted drop, Outerbank, Non-inverting cobra roll, Wave turn, Twisted double down, Bunny hills.

description: Europe's tallest and fastest accelerator coaster. Launches from 0 to 180 km/h in 5 seconds.

description: Tallest, fastest, and longest wooden roller coaster in the Netherlands. Features swooping drops, twisted layout, quick pops of airtime, high-speed turns, helix.

description: Unique Gerstlauer Eurofighter combining theming and thrills. Features a dark ride section, enclosed launch, vertical lift, 97-degree vertical drop, heartline roll.

description: World's first launched flying coaster and world's longest flying coaster. Integrated into the highly themed Rookburgh area. Features two launches, inversions, airtime.
element_tags: Launches, Elevated corkscrew, Airtime.

description: First Wing Coaster in the Netherlands. Anchor of the Avalon themed area. Features a powerful first drop, strong airtime, intense helix, dive-drop, Immelmann, zero-g roll.

location: San Martín de la Vega, Madrid, Community of Madrid
description: Themed to DC Comics superhero Superman. Features 7 inversions including Vertical Loop, Immelmann, Zero-G-Roll, Cobra Roll, and two interlocking Flatspins. Has a straight drop.

description: Steel launched roller coaster, headlining attraction in the Aqualantis park area. Features 2 launches, 4 inversions, a top hat, multiple airtime hills, and low to the ground passes through various trenches.

description: Hydraulically launched steel roller coaster. Opened as the fastest roller coaster in Europe. Features an inline twist, several large turns, and a final turn over the lake.

description: Europe's tallest wooden roller coaster. Prototype Intamin pre-fabricated wooden roller coaster. Retracked and rethemed in 2019. Features extreme elements, smoother ride than traditional woodies, massive fire-spurting monster during finale.
element_tags: Drops, Airtime hills, Helix, Bunny hills, Themed elements (monster).

description: Germany's first Wing Coaster. Features 5 inversions including Dive Drop, Immelmann, Corkscrew, and a Demonic Knot. Themed to demons.

description: Boasts eight inversions, which was a world record until 2002. Themed to Chinese mythology.

description: Europa-Park's first wooden roller coaster. Themed to Norse mythology. Intertwines with Atlantica SuperSplash and Blue Fire. Features airtime sections, tunnels, and a station fly-through.
element_tags: Airtime sections, Tunnels, Station fly-through.

description: Inverted roller coaster themed after the black mamba snake, situated in the "Deep in Africa" area. Two-thirds of the ride is below ground. Features ravines, tunnels, near misses, and a helix with the smallest radius ever built on a B&M.
element_tags: Vertical Loop, Zero-G Roll, Junior Immelmann, Corkscrew, Ravines, Tunnels, Near Misses, Helix.

description: One of the first Gerstlauer Infinity coasters. Features a strong LSM launch, airtime hills, forceful helixes, and 4 inversions including an underground dive loop.

location: Adinkerke-De Panne, West Flanders, Flemish Region
description: Launched coaster themed to the Het Huis Anubis TV series. Features an intense launch, two top hats, and three inversions.

description: Prototype Vekoma suspended thrill coaster. Features multiple rolls, airtime hills, and low-ground turns. Themed to "Die Sieben Schwaben" (The Seven Swabians).

description: Tallest and fastest coaster in the Benelux when opened. Features several airtime hills, a Stengel Dive (121° banked hill), horizontal loop, vertical hill, carousel, and 3 bunny hops.
element_tags: Airtime hills, Stengel Dive, Horizontal loop, Vertical hill, Carousel, Bunny hops.

description: First launched coaster built by Mack Rides and first to feature inversions at Europa-Park. Combination of a dark ride and a launched roller coaster. Features LSM launch, vertical loop, twisted horseshoe roll, heartline roll.
element_tags: Dark/Show Section, LSM Launch, Vertical Loop, Twisted Horseshoe Roll, Heartline Roll, In-line twist.

description: Themed to a gold mine and the "Witte Wieven" spirits. Features a pre-show, a 37.5 meter vertical drop into a smoke-filled pit, Immelmann loop, zero-g roll, and a fast-paced spiral.

description: First of Mack Rides BigDipper model. Features a chain lift, hairpin dive, top hat, dive drop, zero-g roll. Themed to Earth's gravity going haywire.
element_tags: Chain lift hill, Hairpin dive, Top hat, Dive drop, Zero-g roll.

description: Maurer Rides SkyLoop XT 450. Only extended SkyLoop ever built. Starts with a 15-story tall inverted lift hill. Features airtime and intense layout.

location: San Martín de la Vega, Madrid, Community of Madrid
description: Mirror clone of Batman: The Ride. Themed to Batman/Arkham Asylum. Features 5 inversions.

description: Indoor dark ride roller coaster. Combines theme ride/ghost train with roller coaster elements. Themed to Van Helsing.

description: Water coaster/dark ride. Themed to the legend of the Flying Dutchman. Features a dark ride section, splashdown, and coaster elements.

description: Largest operating transportable roller coaster in the world. Only one with five inversions. Named for its five vertical loops resembling Olympic rings.

description: Wooden racing coaster inspired by Saint George and the Dragon. Features two tracks (Water and Fire), bunny hills, and near-misses.

description: Enclosed roller coaster inside a 45-meter high geodesic dome. Heavily refurbished in 2017-2018 with new track and theming. Themed to Moulin Rouge/Paris. Offers a VR experience.
